[E016] Error: cannot declare a constructor on enum `Foo\Bar`
   ,-[code.php:6:22]
   |
 5 | ,-> enum Bar {
 6 | |->      public function __construct() {
   * |                        ^^^^^^|^^^^^^     
   * |                              `----------- constructor is declared here, try removing it
   * |                                          
   * `------------------------------------------ enum `Foo\Bar` is declared here
---'
